resources.string:
Debug is a reality-augmented game which encourages people exercise in a fun way. You will get enough sweat while using your feet to \"burn\" and \"squash\" bugs on the screen.

All games have limitation. We have minimized the requirements of playing the game. Things you need to make sure before playing are:
1. A good light condition while playing
2. Sticky notes/markers of high contrast color with the floor.

We are keen on having your feedback via email: czxttkl@gmail.com<.


Happy debugging!
Aim your marker & touch the camera button.
Put any floor area in the crosshair then touch the camera button.
Stick a high contrast color note on your shoes
Hold your phone hori-zontally, under a good light condition
Aim the crosshair to your note and finish picking its color
